id.description: The unique identifier for this handler instance within the payment.handlers. Used by payment instruments to reference which handler produced them.

name.description: The specification name using reverse-DNS format. For example, dev.ucp.delegate_payment.

spec.description: A URI pointing to the technical specification or schema that defines how this handler operates.

config_schema.description: A URI pointing to a JSON Schema used to validate the structure of the config object.

items.description: A URI pointing to a schema definition (e.g., JSON Schema) used to validate the structure of the instrument object.

config.description: A dictionary containing provider-specific configuration details, such as merchant IDs, supported networks, or gateway credentials.
